attributes.action: Introduce compulsory voting for all eligible British citizens living in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The right to vote is something that our ancestors have fought for for many centuries. Many have even given their lives for this right. These days however the majority don't even go voting and a election turn out is often below 30%, sometimes even 20%. Many people who don't vote then complain. How can they justify this. To protect this democracy we should introduce compulsory voting like in counties such as Australia ensureing a very high turn our

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
